text: Everything in your Bill has now come into force – go straight to the finish line.
Realise don't have power to do everything you want in implementing regulations. Go back 2 spaces.
Consult on guidance; consultation shows some provisions won't work for particular case. Go back 2 spaces.
Pilot scheme reveals gaps in how policy will work in practice. Go back 2 spaces.
Welsh Govt say impossible to implement there until they pass their own legislation. Miss a turn.
The JCSI object to the drafting of your implementing regulations. Miss a turn.
Policy officials have moved on by time implementing regulations drafted. Miss a turn trying to find out original intention behind provisions.
Accidentally repeal old criminal offences before new ones in force – major political embarrassment – go back 2 spaces.
Lots of extra consequential amendments are needed. Miss a turn drafting regulations.
